item.title: Contributing to lndart.cln
item.description: lndart.cln is a Dart framework for Core Lightning. This package is really handy if you wish to interact with your lightning node and develop some cool plugins for it. This post offers detailed guide on how you can start contributing to the lndart.cln package. The only requirement is to have a working Dart SDK. You can follow instructions from here to get up and running. To get started, one should first fork and clone the repository lndart.
